text: Isaiah Guzylak-Messam (born March 10, 1995) is a professional Canadian football defensive back for the BC Lions of the Canadian Football League. He was drafted in the fourth round, 34th overall, in the 2018 CFL Draft by the Lions. He signed with the Lions on May 14, 2018 and initially began the season on the practice roster before making his professional debut on August 25, 2018. He played U Sports football with the Wilfrid Laurier Golden Hawks. ==References== ==External links== *BC Lions bio Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:BC Lions players Category:Canadian football defensive backs Category:Wilfrid Laurier Golden Hawks football players Category:Sportspeople from Hamilton, Ontario Category:Players of Canadian football from Ontario
title: Isaiah Guzylak-Messam
